message.content:
Breakfast:
- 1 cup whole grain oatmeal cooked with water and topped with sliced almonds, raisins, and a drizzle of honey.
- Fresh fruit salad made with strawberries, blueberries, kiwi, and mango.

Lunch:
- Mixed greens salad with spinach, kale, romaine, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and bell peppers.
- Grilled chicken breast on the side.
- Homemade vinaigrette dressing made with olive oil, apple cider vinegar, lemon juice, honey, and Dijon mustard.

Dinner:
- Baked salmon with fresh herbs (parsley, dill, and rosemary) and a squeeze of lemon juice.
- Quinoa salad mixed with chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, bell peppers, olives, and feta cheese. Dressing is made using olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper.
- Side of steamed broccoli tossed in garlic and butter.

Snacks:
- Handful of unsalted nuts and seeds (almonds, walnuts, cashews, pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds).
- A piece of fresh fruit like an apple or banana.
- Greek yogurt with a drizzle of honey and a handful of granola.

Drinks:
- 8 glasses of water throughout the day.
- Green tea in the afternoon for added antioxidants.

Remember to listen to your body's hunger cues and adjust portion sizes accordingly. Enjoy your meal plan!
